movie.title: Miracle on Ice
movie.plot: A fact-based story of how the U.S. Olympic hockey team beat the Soviet Union at the 1980 Lake Placid, New York Winter Olympics, then went on to win the gold medal.

events.title: the US beats the Soviet Union in a game dubbed the "Micacle on Ice"
